items.title: Fuel your weekend with our Hearty Kale Scramble 🥬…
items.content_html:
@sweetmimiscafe

Fuel your weekend with our Hearty Kale Scramble 🥬💝🥚 Healthy iron-rich kale, herb roasted sweet potatoes, caramelized onions, steamed broccoli, and crispy bacon all scrambled together with 3 farm fresh eggs. Finished off with shaved Parmesan and basil. Order this special before it’s gone! Sweet Mimi’s To-Go is every Fri-Mon from 8am-2pm. Visit our website for our full menu and specials. When you’re ready to order, give us a call 📞 ☎️ 518-871-1780 💻 sweetmimiscafe.com

items.title: Happy Sunday Brunch day
items.content_html:
@sweetmimiscafe

Happy Sunday Brunch day! One of our newest specials are these Good for Your Heart Oatmeal Raspberry Pancakes 💖🥞 Two oversized hearty pancakes and topped with fresh raspberries. Finished with our homemade raspberry mascarpone whipped cream and homemade raspberry sauce on the side. One of our winter favorites, get yourself a stack of these lovely pancakes today! Sweet Mimi’s To-Go Fri-Mon 8am-2pm ☎️ 518-871-1780 💻 sweetmimiscafe.com For our complete to-go menu including specials, visit us at our website or click the link in our bio.

For more information, visit splitthebillny.com We have some of your favorite breakfast, brunch, and lunch items available, like our Avocado Smash 🥑💥 Order yours now! ☎️ 518-871-1780 💻 sweetmimiscafe.com Sweet Mimi’s To-Go Thursday-Monday: 8am-2pm

Made with locally crafted sausage, crispy applewood bacon, red & yellow peppers, diced onions, and cheddar cheese in our 3 egg omelette 😋 To see our Weekly Specials and to view our full takeout menu, visit our website and give us a call whenever you are ready to order! 💻 sweetmimiscafe.com ☎️ 518-871-1780

items.title: Picture this
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

Picture this... you had a long week. You’re work schedule was packed with Zoom calls. You had to shovel your driveway only for it to snow again. You watched too much news and doomscrolled for too long. But now it’s FINALLY the weekend. Treat yourself for making it through a long week with a Walt Tart. YOU DESERVE IT! . CAFE INFO: ⭐️ Open until 1pm today ⭐️ Available for online ordering, delivery and pickup (no dine-in at this time) ⭐️ CALL US AT 518-682-3602 #poptarts #breakfastideas #breakfastideas #morningmotivation #morningcoffee #saratogasprings #saratogacounty #saratogaspringsny #saturdayvibes #saturdaymorning #saturdaymood #food #foodporn #foodie #foodstagram #foodblogger

items.title: 😤BATTLE OF THE BREAKFAST SANDWICHES 😤Kick off yo…
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

😤BATTLE OF THE BREAKFAST SANDWICHES 😤Kick off your Super Bowl Sunday with a little competition... who will come out on top- 🏈The classic breakfast sandwich that consistently is a favorite. The BACON egg and cheese (Tom Brady & The Buccaneers) 🏈 The breakfast sandwich with a little kick.. The SAUSAGE egg and cheese (Patrick Mahomes & The Chiefs) . 🏆Who will win? Order both sammie and decide for yourself. Then comment your winner!!! . . . REMEMBER online and call-in orders only today!! Link in bio. . . . #superbowl #superbowl2021 #superbowlsunday #breakfastofchampions #battleofthebreakfast

items.title: TODAY IS SPLIT THE BILL NY 👏
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

TODAY IS SPLIT THE BILL NY 👏! We’re so excited to be participating. Here’s how #splitthebillny works: ⭐️Order online or come in for to-go! ⭐️We’ll print your receipt. Take a picture of your receipt and of your delicious coffee, tea or food! (Maybe tag us if you’re feeling up to it 😉) ⭐️Go to www.splitthebillny.com and complete the Reimbursement Form ⭐️GET UP TO 50% OF YOUR RECEIPT TOTAL REIMBURSED (up to $30)! . This is a great & affordable way to support local 🥰 Our receipt printers are up and ready to take orders! . WALT CAFE: ⭐️Open today until 12pm ⭐️Available for pickup, to-go and online ordering ⭐️Call us! Our number is 518-682-3602 . #saratogasprings #spiltthebill #splitthebillny #supportsmallbusiness #supportlocal #saratogacounty #upstatenewyork #saratogaspringsny #coffeelover #coffeetime

WALT CAFE: ⭐️ Open until 12pm today ⭐️ To-go, curbside pickup, delivery and online ordering available ⭐️ Call us! 518-682-3602 . #saratogasprings #breakfastofchampions #breakfasttime #saratogaspringsny #saratogacounty #veganrecipes #veganfood #vegetarian #vegetarianrecipes

items.title: Happy Presidents’ Day y’all
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

Happy Presidents’ Day y’all!!! Hope you’re enjoying the day off. Other good news to kick off your week. WALT CAFE WILL BE RE-OPENING FOR DINE-IN SERVICE THIS THURSDAY!!!! ***confetti pop*** . We will be opening up Thursday for dine-in service 8am - 2pm. Our new hours are: ⭐️Thurs - Sun: 8am - 2pm available for dine-in, pickup, online ordering, delivery . See all your beautiful masked faces on Thursday 🥰👏✨ . #saratogasprings #saratogaspringsny #saratogacounty #upstatenewyork #upstatenyphotographer #cafehopping #cafe #coffeeshop #coffeeshopvibes #coffeeshopsoftheworld

items.title: BIG NEWS
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

BIG NEWS! Walt and Whitman Brewing has been nominated by USA Today Readers Choice top new brewery for 2021! We are so appreciative to be a finalist alongside other breweries from all across the country. It is all thanks to our extraordinary community--our day 1 customers and familiar faces to new friends and walker-bys. We have each of you to thank. We are so excited to be representing Saratoga, our home and where so much of our inspiration comes from. Lets show up and show out, Saratoga style, please support by voting (link in bio). Also- you can vote EVERYDAY until March 16th!! Set your alarms daily to get that vote in. Lets show the country how supportive Saratoga is :)

items.title: WE GOT OPTIONS
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

WE GOT OPTIONS. Dine in or to go. Order here or online. Grab a sandwich with sausage, bacon, or a vegetarian patty (🔥🔥🔥). Mix and match on English muffins (plain, whole-wheat, gluten-free, cinnamon-raisin). So many good choices you can make today! Choice @walt_cafe for a day best enjoyed ❤️🥰! CAFE HOURS: **dine in** Wednesday-Sunday: 8-2pm BREWERY HOURS **to go only** Thursday-Saturday: 4-8pm Sunday: 12-5pm

items.title: Another snowy day in Saratoga
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

Another snowy day in Saratoga! Cozy up in the Walt Cafe with a warm drink, good wifi, cool art, fresh Walt Tarts, homemade breakfast sammies, and overall great vibes. What better way to spend your Friday?! . ⭐️Walt Tart Flavors: Nutella, Strawberry, Blueberry ⭐️Cafe Hours: 8am-2pm ⭐️Specialty Latte: Raspberry White Mocha ⭐️Now Serving: Vegetarian Breakfast Sammies! ⭐️VOTE for Whitman Brewing for USA Today's Best New Brewery (link in bio) ⭐️TGIF!! 🥳🥳 . #snowday #cafevibes #lounge #coffee #warmandcozy

items.title: It’s the weekend
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

It’s the weekend... TREAT YOURSELF 🥳 These Walt tarts are waiting and they have your name on it! . Today’s flavors: ⭐️ Nutella ⭐️ Cherry ⭐️ Blueberry ⭐️ Brown Cinnamon Sugar . WALT CAFE INFO: ⭐️Open 8am - 2pm ⭐️ Now available for dine-in, to-go and online ordering & delivery 🚚 ⭐️ Call us: 518-682-3602 . #poptarts #poptartmemes #cafe #coffeelover #coffeeshop #coffee #coffeetime #saratogasprings #saratogaspringsny #skidmorecollege #skidmore #saratogacounty #upstatenewyork #upstateny #upstatenylife #518eats #518foodies #518business

items.title: Sunday morning details 🎨
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

Sunday morning details 🎨 . Join us for your morning coffee, afternoon treat (😉😋), or spend the entire day hanging out in the lounge! We encourage browsing the wall art, skimming through the books on the bookshelf, and taking in all the good vibes! 🎨🌿📚☕️ . ⭐️Walt Tart Flavors: Cherry, Strawberry, Brown Cinnamon Sugar, & Nutella ⭐️Cafe Hours: 8am-2pm! ⭐️VOTE for Whitman Brewing @whitman_brewing (our brother brewery located downstairs) for BEST NEW BREWERY IN THE USA! (link in bio!) ⭐️Have a splendid Sunday! 😊😊 . . #sundayvibes #sundaymornings #morningcoffee #interiordesign #interiordecor #interiordesignideas #coffeeandbooks #cafeaesthetics #aesthetic #bookshelfdecor #cafevibes

items.title: We know entertaining your kids is tough these days
items.content_html:
@flatbread.social

We know entertaining your kids is tough these days. SO - we’re including a picture of Flatbread Fred for your kids to color during dinner. We thought about calling him Flatbread Tim, or Flatbread Steve, but the rhyming and alliteration were too much to pass up. Anyway ... we’re here for you. We do it ... for the kids. #flatbreadsocialdistancing #flatbreadfred #forthekids

items.title: Friday, January 29th at Flatbread Social:  All Nig…
items.content_html:
@flatbread.social

Friday, January 29th at Flatbread Social: All Night Happy Hour AND - Teachers Drink free! $5 Cocktails, $10 Bottles of Wine, $20 Growler Fills. The deal is opened to everyone, but we’re encouraging everyone to buy a drink for a teacher. They need them. Teachers - call and claim your drinks! #teachersdrinkfree #allnighthappyhour #teachersofinstagram #teacherlife #teachingduringapandemic #spreadthebread

items.title: We know
items.content_html:
@flatbread.social

We know. It’s f@%*! cold outside. But it’s nice and warm up in here! Come on down and have a pint.. Or two.. Or more. We don’t judge! #daydrinkingatitsfinest #dwightschruteknows #spreadthebread

items.content_html:
@flatbread.social

Big Sunday coming up. Treat yourself with our SB Takeout Family meal! It’s the champion ... of Super Bowl Takeout! Eh? Get it? Ok fine. But it IS delicious and WILL make the Super Bowl more fun for you. Call us the shop or order online to reserve yours now! #superbowl #spreadthebread #treatyoself

Special for the week: Wood-fired Clams, Shrimp, Mussels in a Spicy Tomato Broth with a couple of slices of our House Focaccia. Sh*t, we’ll wood-fire anything in these bad boys. We’re even working on a wood-fired ice cream special. #harryandlloyd #woodfired #spreadthebread

items.title: We’re sorry to announce that we will be closed for…
items.content_html:
@flatbread.social

We’re sorry to announce that we will be closed for today. We’ve been informed that an employee tested positive for COVID. We will be closed today for a deep clean and are following all necessary guidelines. Stay safe!

items.title: So - we will be closed for service this week
items.content_html:
@flatbread.social

So - we will be closed for service this week. We have too many people quarantined for potential exposure to run the restaurants smoothly. As a result, we are taking the week off. Here are some pictures of our staff that we are trying to keep safe and healthy. Hope to see you next week! #effcovid @henrysttaproom
